text: Diocese of Eastern Himalaya is a diocese of the Church of North India. Its seat is Darjeeling. Its area includes states of India as well as Bhutan. There are about 10 congregations in Bhutan. It is likely to be the oldest and largest Protestant denomination of Bhutan. The Diocese has a twinning agreement with the Presbytery of Lothian of the Church of Scotland (which covers Midlothian and East Lothian in South-East Scotland). ==References== World Christian Encyclopedia, 2001 edition, Volume 1, page 119 ==External links== * Category:Christianity in Bhutan Category:Church of North India
title: Diocese of Eastern Himalaya
